title: [Self-directed] ARCS Model-based Mathematics Learning Motivation Design Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental mathematics concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Emphasis on applied mathematics for real-life problem-solving by adult learners.

learning_goals: Cultivation of the ability to design mathematics learning modules applying the four elements of the ARCS model (attention, relevance, confidence, satisfaction)
Development of three or more case studies solving mathematics problems linked to learners' daily lives
Maintaining learning motivation continuity at 80% or higher through a formative assessment system utilizing digital devices
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
